title: Oscar Piastri is probably the next F1 champion, thanks to a dose of Aussie grit
summary: Cricket’s inaugural Test of March 1877 set the tone. An England party that was already exhausted by a hectic schedule – this match in Melbourne was to be the 19th…

qa_pairs.question: Which Australian driver made a significant impact in Formula 1 and is considered a potential future champion?
In which year did Formula 1 driver Oscar Piastri make his debut?
What characteristic is often associated with successful drivers from Australia in Formula 1?
